python-dbgis is a modified version of PPyGIS.

python-dbgis add following features:
- add support for SQLite: add pyspatialite extension
- add WKT attribute
- add unittests
- don't use 'hasattr' builtin

python-dbgis is an extension to Psycopg and pyspatialite, respectively a PostgreSQL and SQLite database adapter for the Python programming language. python-dbgis supports the geometry object types used by PostGIS and SpatiaLite.

python-dbgis has been tested with Python 2.7.
